original_title: ขอให้รักจงเจริญ
overview: Thaen is hit by a car and loses his memories. He starts to live with the woman who hit him as she feels a bit responsible for hurting him other than the fact that she is afraid of getting into any trouble because of this accident.  Thaen is trying to recollect his memories while living with the woman and her nephew.
title: Me… Myself
